definitions.definition: A period of unusually low rainfall , longer and more severe than a dry spell .
examples: His village had faced a drought twice.

definitions.definition: A longer than expected term without success, particularly in sport.
examples: Sri Lanka ended their ten-game drought with a consolation win over Bangladesh.

main_definition: A period of unusually low rainfall , longer and more severe than a dry spell .
secondary_definitions: ( by extension , informal ) A longer than expected term without success, particularly in sport.
